title: The Incredible Hulk is Better If Sick
review: The Incredible Hulk is 56%The acting was either very lifeless and boring or it was to excited and exaggerated.The film had pacing issues. Lots of the scenes in the movie felt a little too long and could have easily been shorter.Overall the film has issues but is just barely good enough for me.

title: Iron Man is AWESOMETACULAR
review: I give this movie 94%Very Entertaining!Works great as a Solo film that doesn't need to set other movies up
